DESCRIPTION: This role involves managing prescription handling, ensuring proper drug storage, and advising patients and healthcare professionals on medications. The candidate should have a background in pharmacy, with at least 1 year of hospital pharmacy experience and strong computer literacy. Key responsibilities include maintaining inventory, managing pharmacy shifts, and ensuring compliance with pharmaceutical laws and regulations. The position also requires managing daily stock demands and overseeing the accurate dispensing of medications.
Skills: Prescription Handling, Drug Dosage, Side Effects, Drug Storage, Pharmacy Inventory Management, Stock Replenishment, Pharmaceutical Compliance, Pharmacy Operations, Shift Management, Stock Issuance, Temperature Log Maintenance, Pharmacy Record Keeping, Expiry Monitoring, Drug Act 1976 Compliance, Inventory Checks, Brand Selection, Pharmacy Software Systems, Hospital Pharmacy
